overview: Angga, Abi, and Eksa, are three single friends, living and studying in the same campus. One night, they have the same dream about a beautiful and sexy girl. Then Rebecca joins their campus and she is just as sexy as the girl in their dream. Rebecca’s arrival in the campus causes a commotion, as all male students are enthralled by her. Then Angga, Abi, and Eksa decide to try to win Rebecca’s heart.
tagline: Maksud ati meluk gunung, ape daya muke nanggung
title: Mupeng (Muka Pengen)
